p: The 5-lipoxygenase (5-LOX) inhibitory potential of 306– 308 from Fusarium sp. was assessed in an attempt to explore their activity against 5-LOX. It is noteworthy that 306 displayed prominent 5-LOX inhibitory activity with IC 50 value of 3.61 μM, compared to that of indomethacin (IC 50 = 1.17 μM), while 307 and 308 had moderate activity with IC 50 values of 7.01 μM and 4.79 μM, respectively [ 101].
